summary:
Are you fed up carrying round a big heavy Woodcutters Axe?
Do you yearn for a more sophisticated way to gather Firewood for crafting etc?
Then look no further - this spell is for you!
descriptionHtml:
Are you fed up carrying round a big heavy Woodcutters Axe?
Do you wish there was a more sophisticated way to gather Firewood for crafting etc?
Then look no further - this spell is for you!
Introducing the Gather Wood Spell
Every time the spell is cast, 2 wood is added to your inventory. 
No more axe or wood chopping block required!

To obtain the spell:
Head on over to Belathor\'s General Goods Store in Whiterun.
On the counter will be a new Spell Tome.

Hi,

Thank you for downloading and trying my Gather Wood Spell.

Installation:
Install with Nexus Mod Manager
Or, you can install manually the .esp file in to your Skyrim\\Data folder

Please feel free to leave feedback and let me know what you think, any improvements you would like, or bugs you may find.

Version History:

V1.1
Added missing script

Other Mods I have done that might interest you:

http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/27599
http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/27338
http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/26099
http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/26201

[color=#00FFFF]Please take note: If you are using a pirated (ie non Steam enabled) version of the game, please do not leave comments about how this part of my mod or that is not working on your game! I am not prepared to waste my time trying to help you out with your illegal software! I\'m unemployed, but still manage to pay for my games (they are what keep me sane) so if I can, you should be able to as well![/color]

SoulMasterII

[IMG]http://i1154.photobucket.com/albums/p535/mike_patrick1/sm0g9rv24znf_zps9d795d9a.gif[/IMG]

[color=#FFFF00]Please, DO NOT upload any part of my mods anywhere else![/color]
author: SoulMasterII
